amendatorysection.catchline: County offices; audit; refusal to exhibit records; penalty.
amendatorysection.para: Every county officer, his deputy and assistants, shall, on demand, exhibit to any examiner all books, papers, records, and accounts pertaining to his office and shall truthfully answer all questions that may be put to him by such examiner touching the affairs of his office. Any person who shall fail or refuse to comply with the provisions of this section shall be guilty of a Class V misdemeanor.
